title: Why Is Camille So Broken?
body: I honestly think that Camille needs a nerf because her damage is insane. For example, her R you can't flash, dash, or get out any other way. Camille either has to leave the ult or get killed. Her e Is also a skill that is broken. She can use her e to go to a wall and then a champ or go over a wall. This is a great way to escape but when people face her it is really stupid.

How?

By even bringing up Jax I can only assume you mean late game, and late game I feel like Jax should eat Camille alive. His E makes it very easy to absorb the damage of her second Q.

I don't play much Jax or Fiora, but I've never had any issue dueling Camille at just about any phase of the game as Master Yi or Tryndamere, both top tier duelists.

In my opinion, Camille should only get a nerf on her E, as is allows for too much safety. It is intended to be for engages, which is does fairly well (maybe even a bit too well ?) but it is also used to just get away quickly, which it shouldn't. 

As for her damages, she is **intended** to be an assassin-like bruiser. So it's normal fer her to have good damages, what's a problem however is how she is able to apply these damages whenever she want with very little counterplay available. Her E is meant to have built-in counterplay on the form of a "requires her to be next to a wall" but in reality it's extremely easy to use, and you can use it most of the time. 

So tl;dr : Her damages are alright, but her E needs some kind of change/nerf.
